title: Bluetooth File Manager 1.2 / File Browser J2ME Java
description:
This java application will allow you to browse the files on another phone over Bluetooth. you can copy files from another phone to yours, delete files from another phone, or copy files from your phone to another phone, aswell as other things.

This is full software, no crappy trial version or shareware demo.

Included is .jar file and the .jad file that some older phones require.

Tested to run fine on a Nokia N95, should work on any phone and brand that supports Java games / applications and has bluetooth.

Nokia Samsung LG Sony Ericsson etc should all work.

(on some phones the langauge may default away from English, you will have to find the settings and change it to english)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

PLEASE SEED as my internet connection can only go upto about 20KBps upstream!
This particular torrent is very small however at about 50KB so should not take too long!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

DESCRIPTION (translated via Google)
Applications can be used for viewing and managing the file system of another device connected via Bluetooth OBEX FTP (This protocol can the majority of phones equipped with Bluetooth).
If the copying of files in the application there were unforeseen falls in conjunction try to reduce the maximum size of the application packet. Some phones may not manage to handle a lot of data at once.
